title: Clinical Trial Enrollment
verified_action_description: Report encounter: medications given, adverse events, request investigator callback; initiates chargeback/reimbursement
not_verified_action_description: Call emergency number on card to report suspicious document or confirm enrollment verbally
notes: Authentication gap accepted: low friction for safety-critical reports; mitigated by human triage and audit trails

title: Building Inspector Badges
verified_action_description: Homeowner records visit details (address, time, inspection type, concerns); never discouraged; bribery deterrent
not_verified_action_description: Report potential impersonation; do not allow entry
notes: Never discouraged principle: every report logged; pattern detection if inspector verified at many addresses but few reports filed

title: Attorney Good Standing
verified_action_description: Response includes URL to bar association public profile (disciplinary history, CLE status, complaint channel)
not_verified_action_description: Report potential unauthorized practice of law; do not proceed with legal engagement
notes: No duplicate infrastructure needed: bar associations have robust existing complaint mechanisms

title: Healthcare Worker Credentials
verified_action_description: Patient/family records interaction details (setting, quality, concerns); write-only from their POV; staffing evidence for workers
not_verified_action_description: Escalate to security and nursing supervisor; do not allow unsupervised patient access
notes: Never discouraged principle: patients always welcomed to record; workers benefit from logged interactions as staffing evidence

title: Law Enforcement Credentials
verified_action_description: Verification ID logged by department; one-click complaint path with ref pre-filled; no POST form (weaponization risk)
not_verified_action_description: Ask for badge number and supervisor; call local dispatch to confirm officer identity
notes: Balances power: citizen gets complaint path with context; department gets pattern detection for auditor harassment; no POST form to avoid weaponization

title: Professional Licenses
verified_action_description: Response includes URL to licensing board public profile (disciplinary history, specialty certs, complaint channel)
not_verified_action_description: Ask for issuing board contact; verify directly with licensing authority before engagement
notes: No duplicate infrastructure needed: licensing boards have robust existing complaint mechanisms; mirrors bar-admission pattern

title: Commercial Insurance Certificates
verified_action_description: Response includes broker contact and link to request updated certificate; identifies specific lapsed segments
not_verified_action_description: Call broker or carrier to verify coverage before proceeding with contract
notes: B2B context: established broker relationships handle follow-up; verification pinpoints which line in multi-carrier portfolio has issues

title: Building Safety Postings
verified_action_description: Response includes URL to inspection history (elevator, restaurant, pool, restroom); patterns matter as much as current status
not_verified_action_description: Contact city/county building or health department; do not use red-tagged equipment
notes: Public facilities get public URL; office facilities may use intranet URL; private equipment may have no history link

title: Tour Guide Verification
verified_action_description: Record tour experience (type, duration, quality, safety concerns); tip link for digital gratuity without cash exchange
not_verified_action_description: Do not proceed with unverified guide; report to tourism board or hotel concierge
notes: Tip mechanism valuable when local currency unfamiliar or ATMs scarce; safety concerns especially important for solo travelers
